resources.string: Re-arrange the letters to form a word based on the given statements.
Guess an alternative word by suggesting letters. Each correct letter guessed will reveal its position in the word. However, inputting three incorrect letters will result in failure.
Choose the correct answer from the choices provided to complete the sentence.
Match items from “Traditional” to the items in the “Alternative” words provided.
Acquiring 10 (ten) points will advance you to the next lesson!
What do you know about the Republic

For "Sexism in Language" 

Video: YouTube. (2018). YouTube. Retrieved January 6, 2024, from https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C_WrLkgMq1k&t=3s.


Text: Kintanar, T. B., & Tongson, A. (1998). Gender-fair language: A Primer. University Center for Women’s Studies, University of the Philippines.


For "Guidelines for Non-Sexist Writing" 

Video: YouTube. (2018a). YouTube. Retrieved January 6, 2024, from https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4nHQ57KYj_w.


Text: Kintanar, T. B., & Tongson, A. (1998). Gender-fair language: A Primer. University Center for Women’s Studies, University of the Philippines.


For "Sexism in Image and Other Literature" 

Video: AMAZE Org. (2018). Gender Roles and Stereotypes. YouTube. YouTube. Retrieved January 6, 2024, from https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ulh0DnFUGsk.


Images: Estebat, R. A. (2023). Use of Gender-Fair Language (pp. 70-71–74).


Text: Michel, A. (1986). Identifying sexism in school textbooks and children’s literature. In Down with stereotypes!: Eliminating sexism from children’s literature and school textbooks (p. 48). essay, UNESCO.

For "Gender-Fair Language in the Vulnerable Sectors (PWD) 

Video: PWDAustralia. (2019). PWDA Disability Language Guide. YouTube. Retrieved January 6, 2024, from https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q4YjIx2-l2A.


Text: Estebat, R. A. (2023). Use of Gender-Fair Language (pp. 70-71–74).


For "Contextualizing Sexist Language" 

Text: Kintanar, T. B., & Tongson, A. (1998). Gender-fair language: A Primer. University Center for Women’s Studies, University of the Philippines.


Other Citation:
